Module.Content:
<html>
</style>
<body style="background-color:#181818">
<iframe style="border: 0px;" id="iFrame"></iframe>
<script src="//plus.google.com/hangouts/_/api/v1/hangout.js"></script>
<script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.9.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script>
function loadIFrame(src){
  var theIFrame = document.getElementById("iFrame");
  theIFrame.src = src

  $("body").css("height", "100%");
  $("html").css("height", "100%");
  $("#iFrame").width("100%");
  $("#iFrame").height("100%");
}

function init() {
  // When API is ready...
  gapi.hangout.onApiReady.add(
    function(eventObj) {
      if (!eventObj.isApiReady) {
  	   console.log("api is not ready")
  	   return
      }
    	var youTubeId = gapi.hangout.onair.getYouTubeLiveId();
    	console.log("is on air hangout", gapi.hangout.onair.isOnAirHangout());
    	console.log("is broadcasting?", gapi.hangout.onair.isBroadcasting());

    	$(document).ready(function(){
        var intervalId = setInterval(function(){
          var youTubeId = gapi.hangout.onair.getYouTubeLiveId();
          if (youTubeId){
            clearInterval(intervalId);
            var appData = gadgets.views.getParams()['appData'];
            var url = "https://localhost:9001/hangout/index.html?appData=" + appData + "&youTubeId=" + youTubeId;
            loadIFrame(url);
          }
        }, 250);
    	});
  });
}

// Wait for gadget to load.
gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(init);
</script>
</body>
